text: Yesha Rughani (born 24 March 1992) is a television actress . She has portrayed the role of Devika Babber in Zee TV's serial Jeet Gayi Toh Piya Morey and Muskaan Singh in Star Bharat's serial Muskaan. == Early life and education == Yesha was born on 23rd March,1992. She completed her Schooling from Rajkot and pursued a degree in design and fashion communication from Symbiosis Institute of Design, Maharashtra. Before pursuing her career in acting, She worked as a Stylist for Priyanka Chopra, Esha Gupta, Malaika Arora among others. == career == In 2017, Yesha made her television debut with Jeet Gayi Toh Piya Morey opposite Krip Suri. After that from May 2018, she played Lead in Muskaan. ==Television== {|class="wikitable" |- !Year !Show !Role !Channel !Notes |- |2017-2018 |Jeet Gayi Toh Piya Morey |Devi Adhiraj Rajawat/Devika Varun Babbar |rowspan="1"|Zee TV |rowspan="2"|Lead Role |- |2018-2020 |Muskaan |Muskaan Bose / Muskaan Raunak Singh |Star Bharat |} ==References== == External links == Category:1991 births Category:Indian actresses Category:Indian television actresses Category:people from Gujarat Category:Living people
title: Yesha Rughani
